name: ITTTNOALTSFATWWAMPTJBANCKSUE10S!
description:
Full Title: I'm trying to take notes on a lecture to study for a test while working at my part time job, but a new customer keeps showing up every 10 seconds!

A game about multitasking and studying by Fenrei, jar, dood, Randy Labrecque(@PerfectWarudo on Twitter) and Gabe(@_Diaburo on Twitter), made for Ludum Dare 51 (theme: Every 10 Seconds)

Ludum Dare link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/$306314
